name: Quest Together
description:
Note: Registration for the playtest is currently closed. Registration typically opens every few weeks after each new update, so keep an eye on the discord if you want to join! Thank you!



Take up your sword and shield and go on a quest with your friends!
Quest Together is a social VR where you can hang out and play games together. As a new Rookie Hero, you get stationed in a small town that's been suffering from recent monster attacks. Take up quests and defend the town from monsters and help out with the villagers' requests. Meet other Heroes in the guild tavern and team up together for adventure, or partake in some PVP matches.

  • Enjoy online multiplayer in VR and make new friends, or invite your existing ones
  • Form a 4-player party and go on co-op quests together
  • For the competitive Heroes, enjoy a PVP mode in the arena to earn new gear and rewards
  • Customize your character how you want
  • Unlock new outfits, armor sets and gear by playing
  • Strategize with your party by dividing roles: melee, ranged, support, etc.
  • Work your way up from small fry goblins to large bosses that won't go down without a fight


The game is currently in its early days and still trying to get off the ground. Join the community to be a part of the process and stay up to date with new new game updates and what not.

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/eNjBWWhpJA
Quest Together on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/QuestTogether/


If you like the game so far, please consider supporting us on Patreon! It's entirely optional and is merely a way to support development. The game is and will remain free to play.

Quest Together on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/QuestTogether
